headline: To Learn: Culinary Historians  Host Viennese Artists
abstract: Honey & Bunny will discuss their work at a meeting of the Culinary Historians of New York.
lead_paragraph: The wit and whimsy of the performance artists Sonja Stummerer and Martin Hablesreiter of the Viennese architecture and design firm Honey & Bunny know no bounds. At a meeting of the Culinary Historians of New York, they will discuss the interaction between design and whatâ€™s on the table and how it affects social norms.
